pheading1.label: For devices have screen width from 1200px up to greater.

pheading2.label: For devices have screen width from 768px up to 1199px.

pheading3.label: For devices have screen width from 480px up to 767px.

pheading4.label: For devices have screen width less than or equal 479px.

product_category.label: Select Category
product_category.comment: Please select one or more listingtabs.

child_category_products.label: Child Category Products
child_category_products.comment: Include or Exclude Products from Child Categories.

max_depth.label: Category Depth
max_depth.comment: The number of child category levels to return.

product_order_dir.label: Ordering Direction
product_order_dir.comment: For Order By: ID, Name, Date Created, Price

category_image_heading2.label: Get Image from Category Image Thumbnail Image

imgcfgcat_constrainOnly.label: Constrain Only
imgcfgcat_constrainOnly.comment: If the "constrainOnly" parameter is set to true, in this case the images which are smaller than specified value will be not enlarged by Magento. Only border of such images will increase.

imgcfgcat_keepAspectRatio.label: Keep Aspect Ratio
imgcfgcat_keepAspectRatio.comment: If the "keepAspectRatio" parameter is set to true, in this case the proportions of the image will not be modified.

imgcfgcat_keepFrame.label: Keep Frame
imgcfgcat_keepFrame.comment: The "keepFrame" parameter guarantees that the image will be not cropped. When "keepAspectRatio" is false the "keepFrame" will not work.

imgcfgcat_keepTransparency.label: Keep Transparency
imgcfgcat_keepTransparency.comment: The "keepTransparency" parameter keep the transparent background of the images.

imgcfgcat_background.label: Background Color
imgcfgcat_background.comment: Please Click the text box to select color

imgcfg_constrainOnly.label: Constrain Only
imgcfg_constrainOnly.comment: If the "constrainOnly" parameter is set to true, in this case the images which are smaller than specified value will be not enlarged by Magento. Only border of such images will increase.

imgcfg_keepAspectRatio.label: Keep Aspect Ratio
imgcfg_keepAspectRatio.comment: If the "keepAspectRatio" parameter is set to true, in this case the proportions of the image will not be modified.

imgcfg_keepFrame.label: Keep Frame
imgcfg_keepFrame.comment: The "keepFrame" parameter guarantees that the image will be not cropped. When "keepAspectRatio" is false the "keepFrame" will not work.

imgcfg_background.label: Background Color
imgcfg_background.comment: Please Click the text box to select color

pheading5.label: Config When Type Module is Slider.

loop.label: Display Loop
loop.comment: Inifnity loop. Duplicate last and first items to get loop illusion.

slideBy.label: Slide By
slideBy.comment: Navigation slide by x. 'page' string can be set to slide by page.

startPosition.label: Start Position Item
startPosition.comment: Start position or URL Hash string like '#id'.

use_cache.label: Caching
use_cache.comment: Select whether to cache the content of this module

cache_time.label: Cache Time
cache_time.comment: The time (in seconds) before the module is recached.
